standard.name: Dancing Star
standard.effect:
Produces a fiery explosion that can cause nearby opponents to start burning.
Destroys monster nests.
+100 Fire damage

enhanced.name: Enhanced Dancing Star
enhanced.effect:
Produces a fiery explosion that can cause nearby opponents to start burning. Enhanced effect.
Destroys monster nests.
+200 Fire damage

superior.name: Superior Dancing Star
superior.effect:
Produces a fiery explosion that ignites the surrounding area. Enhanced and extended effect.
Destroys monster nests.
+300 Fire damage

standard.name: Devil's Puffball
standard.effect:
Releases a cloud of poison when detonated.
10s Effect duration
+100 Poison damage

enhanced.name: Enhanced Devil's Puffball
enhanced.effect:
Releases a cloud of poison when detonated. Enhanced effect.
30s Effect duration
+100 Poison damage

superior.name: Superior Devil's Puffball
superior.effect:
Releases a cloud of poison when detonated. Enhanced and extended effect.
33s Effect duration
+100 Poison damage

standard.name: Dimeritium Bomb
standard.effect:
Releases a cloud of dimeritium slivers that block magic and monsters' magic abilities.
15s Effect duration

enhanced.name: Enhanced Dimeritium Bomb
enhanced.effect:
Releases a cloud of dimeritium slivers that block magic and monsters' magic abilities.
30s Effect duration

superior.name: Superior Dimeritium Bomb
superior.effect:
Releases a cloud of dimeritium slivers that block magic and monsters' magic abilities. The blockade survives for a short time after the cloud dissipates.
30s Effect duration

standard.name: Dragon's Dream
standard.effect:
Releases a cloud of gas that explodes when ignited.
15s Effect duration
+300 Fire damage

enhanced.name: Enhanced Dragon's Dream
enhanced.effect:
Releases a cloud of gas that explodes when ignited. Enhanced effect and chance to apply Burning.
30s Effect duration
+400 Fire damage

superior.name: Superior Dragon's Dream
superior.effect:
Releases a cloud of gas that exploded when ignited. Enhanced effect and chance to apply Burning. Foes it kills explode, wounding others nearby.
30s Effect duration
+400 Fire damage

standard.name: Grapeshot
standard.effect:
Inflicts shrapnel damage to foes within its explosion radius. Deals a small amount of fire damage.
Destroys monster nests.
+350 Physical damage
+350 Silver damage
+5 Fire damage

enhanced.name: Enhanced Grapeshot
enhanced.effect:
Inflicts shrapnel damage to foes within its explosion radius. Deals fire damage. Enhanced effect.
Destroys monster nests.
+600 Physical damage
+600 Silver damage
+10 Fire damage

superior.name: Superior Grapeshot
superior.effect:
Inflicts shrapnel damage to foes within its explosion radius. Deals fire damage. Enhanced effect. Damage ignores enemy armor.
Destroys monster nests.
+900 Physical damage
+900 Silver damage
+10 Fire damage

standard.name: Moon Dust
standard.effect:
Contains silver splinters that temporarily prevent monsters from transforming.
20s Effect duration

enhanced.name: Enhanced Moon Dust
enhanced.effect:
Contains silver splinters that temporarily prevent monsters from transforming. Extended duration.
40s Effect duration

superior.name: Superior Moon Dust
superior.effect: Contains silver splinters that permanently prevent monsters from transforming.

standard.name: Northern Wind
standard.effect:
Freezes foes. Blows landed on frozen foes deal additional damage.
4s Effect duration

enhanced.name: Enhanced Northern Wind
enhanced.effect:
Freezes foes. Blows landed on frozen foes deal additional damage.
4s Effect duration

superior.name: Superior Northern Wind
superior.effect:
Freezes foes. Blows landed on frozen foes deal additional damage. Extended duration.
Chance of instant kill.
10s Effect duration

standard.name: Samum
standard.effect:
Blinds opponents within its explosion radius.
Destroys monster nests.

enhanced.name: Enhanced Samum
enhanced.effect:
Blinds opponents within its explosion radius. Extended duration.
Destroys monster nests.
+600 Physical damage
+600 Silver damage
+10 Fire damage

superior.name: Superior Samum
superior.effect:
Blinds opponents within its explosion radius. Extended duration. The first hit landed on a blinded opponent is always critical.
Destroys monster nests.
100% Critical hit chance
8s Effect duration

standard.name: Black Blood
standard.effect:
Witcher's blood injures vampires and necrophages when they wound him.
+15% Damage returned

enhanced.name: Enhanced Black Blood
enhanced.effect:
Witcher's blood injures and knocks back vampires and necrophages when they wound him.
+20% Damage returned

superior.name: Superior Black Blood
superior.effect:
Vampires and necrophages start Bleeding when near the witcher. In addition, the witcher's blood injures and knocks them back when they wound him.
+30% Damage returned

standard.name: Blizzard
standard.effect:
Whenever you slay an enemy, time slows for a short period.
+50% Slowdown

enhanced.name: Enhanced Blizzard
enhanced.effect:
Whenever you slay an enemy, time slows for a short period. Extended duration.
+55% Slowdown

superior.name: Superior Blizzard
superior.effect:
Whenever you slay an enemy, time slows for a short period. If 3 Adrenaline Points are available, during this period actions don't deplete Stamina.
+60% Slowdown

standard.name: Cat
standard.effect:
Grants sight in total darkness.
+25 Range of vision.

enhanced.name: Enhanced Cat
enhanced.effect:
Grants sight in total darkness and immunity to hypnosis. Extended duration.
+25 Range of vision

superior.name: Superior Cat
superior.effect:
Grants sight in total darkness and immunity to hypnosis. Extended duration.
+25 Range of vision

standard.name: Full Moon
standard.effect:
Increases maximum Vitality.
+300 Vitality

enhanced.name: Enhanced Full Moon
enhanced.effect:
Increases maximum Vitality. Extended duration.
+1100 Vitality

superior.name: Superior Full Moon
superior.effect:
Increases maximum Vitality. Extended duration. Heals Vitality by an amount equal to current Toxicity
+1500 Vitality

standard.name: Golden Oriole
standard.effect: Grants immunity to poisons, neutralizes the effects of poisons already in bloodstream.

enhanced.name: Enhanced Golden Oriole
enhanced.effect: Grants immunity to poisons, neutralizes the effects of poisons already in bloodstream. Extended duration.

superior.name: Superior Golden Oriole
superior.effect: Extended duration. Poisons now heal instead of doing damage.

standard.name: Killer Whale
standard.effect:
Increases breath supply while underwater by 50% and improves vision while diving.
+50% breath

standard.name: Maribor Forest
standard.effect:
Accelerates the generation of Adrenaline Points.
+0.15 Adrenaline Point gain

enhanced.name: Enhanced Maribor Forest
enhanced.effect:
Accelerates the generation of Adrenaline Points. Extended duration.
+0.15 Adrenaline Point gain

superior.name: Superior Maribor Forest
superior.effect:
Accelerates the generation of Adrenaline Points. Extended duration. Grants 1 Adrenaline Point upon consumption.
+0.15 Adrenaline Point gain

standard.name: Potion of Clearance
standard.effect: Returns all Ability Points spent to develop Abilities to the available pool so you can redistribute them.

+15% Sign intensity

enhanced.effect:
Increases Sign intensity. Extended duration.
+20% Sign intensity

superior.name: Superior Petri's Philter
superior.effect:

+25% Sign intensity

standard.effect:
Accelerates Vitality regeneration. Vitality regeneration pauses for 2 seconds upon receiving damage.
+80 Vitality regeneration
+40 Vitality regeneration during combat

enhanced.name: Enhanced Swallow
enhanced.effect:
Accelerates Vitality regeneration. Vitality regeneration pauses for 2 seconds upon receiving damage.
+100 Vitality regeneration
+65 Vitality regeneration during combat

superior.name: Superior Swallow
superior.effect:
Accelerates Vitality regeneration. Taking damage does not interrupt regeneration.
150 Vitality regeneration
+80 Vitality regeneration during combat

+8% Stamina regeneration in combat

Increases Attack Power. Extended duration.
+30% Attack power

standard.name: White Honey
standard.effect: Clears Toxicity and cancels all active potion effects.

enhanced.name: Enhanced White Honey
enhanced.effect: Clears Toxicity and cancels all active potion effects.

superior.name: Superior White Honey
superior.effect: Clears Toxicity and cancels all active potion effects.

standard.name: White Raffard's Decoction
standard.effect:
Immediately restores a portion of Vitality.
35% Vitality (Non-NG+)
+60% Vitality (NG+)

enhanced.name: Enhanced White Raffard's Decoction
enhanced.effect:
Immediately restores a large portion of Vitality.
+60% Vitality (Non-NG+)
+80% Vitality (NG+)

superior.name: Superior White Raffard's Decoction
superior.effect:
Restores Vitality immediately and fully. Grants immunity to damage for a short duration.
 100% Vitality (Both Non-NG+ and NG+)

signs.name: Aard
signs.effect: Offensive sign resulting in a telekinetic thrust that can stun, repel, knock down or disarm opponents, as well as remove barriers and other objects

signs.name: Axii
signs.effect: Offensive sign creating a mental wave that triggers a hex that causes an enemy to fight alongside the caster

signs.name: Igni
signs.effect: Offensive sign resulting in a pyrokinetic burst that can repel and ignite opponents, as well as start fires

signs.name: Quen
signs.effect: Defensive sign forming a protective field around the caster

signs.name: Yrden
signs.effect: Offensive sign creating a magical trap on the ground that triggers a limited number of times when traversed
